chapter.text: 43|1|Ha - mima.
43|2|Suspasta kitabera sapatha
43|3|niscaya amara etake (abatirna) karechi arabi (bhasaya) kura'ana, yate tomara bujhate para.
43|4|Ara niscaya ta amadera kache unmula kitabe ucca maryadasampanna, hikamatapurna.
43|5|Amara ki tomadera theke e upadesabani sampurnarupe pratyahara kare neba e karane ye, tomara simalanghanakari sampradaya
43|6|ara purbabatidera kache amara bahu nabi prerana karechilama.
43|7|Ara yakhana'i tadera kache kono nabi eseche tara take niye thatta-bidrupa kareche.
43|8|Phale yara edera ceye saktite prabala chila taderake amara dhbansa karechilama; ara gata hayeche purbabartidera anurupa drstanta.
43|9|Ara apani yadi taderake jijnesa karena, ‘ke asamanasamuha o yamina srsti kareche?’ Tara abasya'i balabe, ‘egulo to srsti karechena parakramasali sarbajna'i.’
43|10|Yini tomadera jan'ya yaminake baniyechena sayya [1] ebam tate baniyechena tomadera calara patha [2], yate tomara sathika patha pete para
43|11|ara yini asamana theke bari barsana karena parimitabhabe [1]. Atahpara ta dbara amara sanjibita kari nirjiba janapadake. Ebhabe'i tomaderake bera kara habe.
43|12|Ara yini sakala prakarera jora yugala srsti karechena ebam yini tomadera jan'ya srsti karechena emana nauyana o grhapalita jantu yate tomara arohana kara

43|13|yate tomara era pithe sthira haye basate para, tarapara tomadera rabera anugraha smarana karabe yakhana tomara era upara sthira haye basabe ebam balabe [1], ‘pabitra-mahana tini, yini eguloke amadera basibhuta kare diyechena. Ara amara samartha chilama na ederake basibhuta karate.
43|14|‘Ara niscaya amara amadera rabera kache'i pratyabartanakari.’
43|15|Ara tara tamra bandadera madhya theke tamra ansa sabyasta kareche [1]. Niscaya'i manusa spasta akrtajna.
43|16|Naki tini ya srsti karechena ta hate kan'ya santana grahana karechena ebam tomaderake bisista karechena putra santana dbara
43|17|Ara yakhana tadera ka'uke susambada deya haya ya rahamanera prati tara drstanta pesa kare ta dbara, takhana tara mukhamandala malina haye yaya ematabasthaya ye se duhsaha yatanaklista.
43|18|Ara ye alankare lalita-palita haya ebam se bitarkakale spasta baktabye asamartha se ki? (Allahara jan'ya sabyasta habe)
43|19|ara tara rahamanera banda pheresataganake nari ganya kareche; edera srsti ki tara dekhechila? Tadera saksya abasya'i lipibad'dha kara habe ebam taderake jijnesa kara habe.
43|20|Tara ara'o bale, ‘rahamana icche karale amara edera ibadata karatama na.’ E bisaye tadera kono jnana ne'i; tara to sudhu managara katha balache.
43|21|Naki amara taderake kura'anera age kono kitaba diyechi atahpara tara ta drrhabhabe dharana kare ache
43|22|baram tara bale, ‘niscaya amara amadera pitrpurusaderake eka matadarsera upara peyechi ebam niscaya amara tadera padanka anusarane hedayatapraapta haba.’

43|23|Ara ebhabe'i apanara purbe kono janapade yakhana'i amara kono satarkakari pathiyechi takhana'i tara bilasapriyara baleche, ‘niscaya amara amadera pitrpurusaderake eka matadarse peyechi ebam amara tadera'i padanka anusarana kare thakaba.’

43|24|Se satarkakari baleche, ‘tomara tomadera pitrpurusaderake ye pathe peyecha, ami yadi tomadera jan'ya tara ceye utkrsta patha niye asi tabu'o ki (tomara tadera anusarana karabe)?’ Tara baleche, ‘niscaya tomara ya saha prerita hayecha amara tara sathe kupharikari.’
43|25|Phale amara tadera theke pratisodha nilama. Sutaram dekhuna, mithyaropakaridera parinama kemana hayeche
43|26|ara smarana karuna, yakhana ibarahima tara pita ebam tara sampradayake balechilena, ‘tomara yegulora ibadata kara niscaya ami tadera theke samparkamukta.
43|27|Tabe tini byatita yini amake srsti karechena atahpara niscaya tini sighra'i amake satpathe paricalita karabena.’
43|28|Ara e ghosanake tini cirantana banirupe rekhe giyechena tara uttarasuridera madhye, yate tara phire ase.
43|29|Baram ami taderake ebam tadera pitrpurusaderake diyechilama bhoga karate, abasese tadera kache asala satya ebam spasta barnanakari rasula.
43|30|Ara yakhana tadera kache satya asala, takhana tara balala, ‘e to jadu ebam niscaya amara tara sathe kupharakari.’
43|31|Ara tara bale, ‘e kura'ana kena nayila kara hala na du'i janapadera kono mahana byaktira upara?’

43|32|Tara ki apanara rabera rahamata [1] bantana kare? Amara'i duniyara jibane tadera madhye tadera jibika bantana kari ebam tadera ekajanake an'yera upara maryadaya unnita kari yate eke an'yera dbara kaja kariye nite pare; ara apanara rabera rahamata tara ya jama kare ta theke utkrstatara.

43|33|Ara saba manusa eka matabalambi haye parabe, e asanka na thakale dayamayera sathe yara kuphari kare, taderake amara ditama tadera gharera jan'ya raupya-nirmita chada o simri yate tara arohana kare
43|34|ebam tadera gharera jan'ya daraja o palanka---yate tara helana deya
43|35|ara (anurupa ditama) sbarna nirmita'o [1] ebam e saba'i to sudhu duniyara jibanera bhoga-sambhara. Ara akhirata apanara rabera nikata muttakidera jan'ya'i.
43|36|Ara ye rahamanera yikara theke bimukha haya amara tara jan'ya niyojita kari eka sayatana, atahpara se haya tara sahacara.
43|37|Ara niscaya tara'i (sayatanara) manusaderake satpatha theke badha deya, athaca manusara (bhrasta pathe thakara para'o) mane kare tara (nijera) hedayatapraapta [1].
43|38|Abasese yakhana se amadera nikata asabe, takhana se sayatanake balabe, haya! Amara o tomara madhye yadi purba o pascimera byabadhana thakata!’ Sutaram e sahacara kata'i na nikrsta
43|39|ara aja tomadera e anutapa tomadera kono kaje'i asabe na, yehetu tomara yuluma karechile; niscaya tomara sakale'i sastite sarika.
43|40|Apani ki sonate parabena badhirake athaba hedayata dite parabena andhake o ye spasta bibhraantite ache
43|41|atahpara yadi amara apanake niye ya'i, tabe niscaya amara tadera theke pratisodha neba [1]
43|42|athaba amara taderake ye sastira oyada diyechi, apanake amara ta dekha'i, tabe niscaya tadera upara amara purna ksamatabana.
43|43|Kaje'i apanara prati ya ohi kara hayeche ta drrhabhabe abalambana karuna. Niscaya apani sarala pathe rayechena.
43|44|Ara niscaya e kura'ana apanara o apanara sampradayera jan'ya yikara [1] ebam acire'i tomara jijnasita habe.
43|45|Ara apanara purbe amara amadera rasulagana theke yaderake prerana karechilama taderake jijnesa karuna, amara ki rahamana chara ibadata kara yaya emana kono ilaha sthira karechilama [1]
43|46|ara abasya'i musake amara amadera nidarsanabalisaha phira’a'una o tara netrbargera nikata pathiyechilama. Tini balechilena, ‘niscaya ami srstikulera rabera ekajana rasula. ’
43|47|Atahpara yakhana tini tadera kache amadera nidarsanabalisaha asalena takhani tara ta niye hasi-thatta karate lagala.
43|48|Ara amara taderake ye nidarsana'i dekhiyechi ta chila tara anurupa nidarsanera ceye sresthatara. Ara amara taderake sasti diye pakara'o karalama yate tara phire ase.
43|49|Ara tara balechila, ‘he jadukara! Tomara rabera kache tumi amadera jan'ya ta prarthana kara ya tini tomara sathe angikara karechena, niscaya'i amara satpatha abalambana karaba.’
43|50|Atahpara yakhana amara tadera theke sasti sariye nilama takhana'i tara angikara bhanga kare basala.
43|51|Ara phira’a'una tara sampradayera madhye ghosana kare balala, ‘he amara sampradaya! Misara rajya ki amara naya? Ara e nadigulo amara padadese prabahita; tomara ki dekhacha na
43|52|naki ami e byakti hate srestha na'i, ye hina ebam spasta katha balate'o praya aksama
43|53|‘Tabe take (musa) kena deya hala na sbarna-balaya athaba tara sange kena asala na pheresatagana dalabad'dhabhabe?’
43|54|Ebhabe se tara sampradayake boka banala, phale tara tara katha mene nila  niscaya tara chila eka phasika sampradaya.
43|55|Atahpara yakhana tara amaderake kraodhambita karala takhana amara tadera theke pratisodha nilama ebam nimajjita karalama tadera sakalake ekatritabhabe.
43|56|Phale parabartidera jan'ya amara taderake kare rakhalama atita itihasa o drstanta.
43|57|Ara yakhana'i mara'iyama-tanayera drstanta pesa kara haya, takhana apanara sampradaya tate soragola arambha kare deya.
43|58|Ara tara bale, ‘amadera upasyagulo sraestha na ‘isa?’ Era sudhu baka-bitandara uddesye'i take apanara samane pesa kare. Baram era eka jhagarate sampradaya.
43|59|Tini to kebala amara'i eka banda, yara upara amara anugraha karechilama ebam take baniyechilama bani isara'ilera jan'ya drstanta [1].
43|60|Ara yadi amara icche karatama tabe tomadera paribarte pheresata srsti karate paratama, yara yamine uttaradhikari hata [1].
43|61|Ara niscaya ‘isa kiyamatera niscita nidarsana; kaje'i tomara kiyamate sandeha karona. Ara tomara amara'i anusarana kara. Eta'i sarala patha.
43|62|Sayatana yena tomaderake kichute'i badha na deya, niscaya se tomadera prakasya sakra.

43|63|Ara ‘isa yakhana spasta pramanadisaha asala, takhana tini balechilena, ‘ami abasya'i tomadera kache esechi hikamatasaha ebam tomara ye kichu bisaye matabheda karacha, ta spasta kare deyara jan'ya. Kaje'i tomara allahara taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara’.
43|64|Niscaya allaha, tini amara raba ebam tomadera'o raba, ata'eba tomara tamra ‘ibadata kara; eta'i sarala patha.’
43|65|Atahpara tadera madhya theke katagulo dala matanaikya karala, kaje'i yalimadera jan'ya durbhoga yantranadayaka dinera sastira
43|66|Tara to tadera ajnatasare hathat kare kiyamata asara'i apeksa karache.
43|67|Bandhura sedina haye parabe eke an'yera satrau, muttakira chara.
43|68|He amara bandagana! Aja tomadera kono bhaya ne'i ebam tomara cintita'o habe na.
43|69|Yara amara ayate imana enechila ebam yara chila musalima
43|70|tomara ebam tomadera strigana [1] sanande jannate prabesa kara.
43|71|Sbarnera thala o panapatra niye taderake pradaksina kara habe; sekhane mana ya caya ebam yate nayana trpta haya ta'i thakabe. Ara sekhane tomara sthayi habe.
43|72|Ara eta'i jannata, tomaderake yara adhikari kara hayeche, tomadera kajera phalasbarupa.
43|73|Sekhane tomadera jan'ya rayeche pracura phalamula, ta theke tomara khabe.
43|74|Niscaya aparadhira jahannamera sastite sthayi habe
43|75|tadera sasti laghaba kara habe na ebam tara tate hatasa haye parabe.
43|76|Ara amara tadera prati yuluma karini, kintu tara nijera'i chila yalima.
43|77|Tara citkara kare balabe, ‘he maleka [1], tomara raba yena amaderake nihsesa kare dena.’ Se balabe, ‘niscaya tomara abasthanakari habe.’
43|78|Allaha balabena, ‘abasya'i amara tamadera kache satya niye esechilama, kintu tomadera besira bhaga'i chile satya apachandakari.’
43|79|Naki tara kono byapare curanta sid'dhanta grahana kareche? Niscaya ami'i to curanta sid'dhantakari.
43|80|Naki tara mane kare ye, amara tadera gopana bisaya o mantrana sunate pa'i na? Abasya'i, hyam. Ara amadera pheresatagana tadera kache theke sabakichu likhache.
43|81|Baluna, ‘dayamaya allahara kono santana thakale ami hatama tamra ibadate ghrnakaridera agrani [1]
43|82|‘tara ya aropa kare ta theke asamanasamuha o yaminera raba ebam ‘arasera raba pabitra-mahana.
43|83|Ata'eba apani taderake chere dina tara magna thakuka behuda kathaya ebam matta thakuka khela-tamasaya ye dinera oyada deya hayeche tara sam'mukhina ha'oyara aga paryanta.
43|84|Ara tini'i satya ilah‌ asamane ebam tini'i satya ilah‌ yamine. Ara tini hikamata'oyala, sarbajna.

43|85|Ara tini barakatamaya, yara kartrtbe rayeche asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichu. Ara kiyamatera jnana sudhu tamra'i ache ebam tamra'i kache tomaderake pratyabartita kara habe.
43|86|Ara tini chara tara yaderake dake, tara suparisera malika habe na, tabe tara chara, yara jene-sune satya saksya deya.
43|87|Ara yadi apani taderake jijnesa karena, ke taderake srsti kareche, tara abasya'i balabe, ‘allaha.’ Atahpara tara kothaya phire yacche
43|88|ara tara (rasula) e ukti: ‘He amara raba! Niscaya era emana sampradaya yara imana anabe na.’
43|89|Kaje'i apani taderake upeksa karuna ebam baluna, ‘salama' ; atahpara tara sighra'i janate parabe.
